title: Many extensions don't work on support.mozilla.org
content:
Hi üôÇ

Many extensions don't work on support.mozilla.org.

For ex, Clippings and Unicodify ‚Äì Text transformer are very useful to write text. It's annoying not to be able to use them to write in https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird/form.


Seeing https://old.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/tyytcy/how_to_get_rid_of_this_extension_restriction/i3vke2p/ :


1) Why is support.mozilla.org privileged and can pull out information about visitor's system, while connect.mozilla.org cannot?


2) I see that:

  • Copy Link Text works,
  • Unicodify ‚Äì Text transformer is able to read selected text but not to write in forms,
  • Clippings is not able to read selected text.

Is there a doc which explains what are the limits of what's allowed for extensions in "internal restricted sites"?

title: Possible duplicate Firefox accounts with the same email
content:
Dear Firefox Support Team,

I am writing to request assistance regarding what appears to be a duplicate or disconnected Firefox Sync account.

I‚Äôve been using Firefox Sync with the email address inhucr@gmail.com on two different devices: 

   On my work computer, I had access to over 143 saved passwords 
   On my personal computer, I could only see 33 saved passwords

However, I was still able to log in to websites automatically on my personal computer, even though I couldn‚Äôt view the saved passwords in the password manager. This made me suspect that the data might be stored locally or that the devices were syncing separately.

A few days ago, I deleted all saved passwords from my work computer (after backing them up to a spreadsheet) and then logged out of the Firefox account on that device. Later, when I checked Firefox on my personal computer, the 33 passwords were still there and unchanged, which confirmed my suspicion that I might be using two Firefox accounts that look identical but are not actually connected.

I also noticed that I can no longer log back into the version of the account I was using at work ‚Äî the system rejects the password I currently use on my personal device, despite both using the same email address.

Could you please verify whether there are two separate Firefox accounts linked to this email address or help me recover access to the original Sync data?

Thank you very much for your support.

Kind regards, Ingrid Hurtado
creator: inhucr

title: Vietnamese text disappears after pressing backspace and typing punctuation in Firefox
content:
I'm experiencing a consistent issue when typing Vietnamese using the built-in Windows Vietnamese keyboard (IME) in Firefox. Steps to reproduce: 

   Type a Vietnamese word 
   Press space after the word 
   Immediately press backspace to delete the space 
   Then type a punctuation mark, such as ,, ., (, ), ;, etc 
   The entire word just typed is deleted immediately after pressing the punctuation key.

Notes: 

   This issue does not happen in other browsers like Chrome or Edge. 
   It only occurs when using the Windows built-in Vietnamese IME (not 3rd-party input tools like EVKey or Unikey). 
   The bug seems related to how Firefox handles IME input, especially when mixing backspace and punctuation. 
   It is very disruptive when typing Vietnamese naturally, especially in form fields, textareas, or comments.


Please look into this issue or let me know if there‚Äôs a workaround. It's been a consistent obstacle when typing Vietnamese and I don't want to use another tool just to type Vietnamese in Firefox, thank you.

title: What is Lactobacillus used for?
content: Lactobacillus is a type of beneficial bacteria commonly used as a probiotic to support digestive health and restore the natural balance of bacteria in the gut. It is helpful in managing conditions such as diarrhea, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), and lactose intolerance. Lactobacillus also plays a role in boosting the immune system and preventing harmful bacteria from thriving in the digestive tract. It is available in supplements, yogurts, and fermented foods. To ensure quality and effectiveness, you can Buy Buyoncomed for a wide range of trusted probiotic supplements tailored to support your overall health and wellness.
